original_text: Say thou thus unto them, Thus saith the Lord God; As I live, surely they that are in the wastes shall fall by the sword, and him that is in the open field will I give to the beasts to be devoured, and they that be in the forts and in the caves shall die of the pestilence.
korean_text: 너는 그들에게 이르기를 주 여호와께서 이같이 말씀하시되 내가 나의 삶을 두고 맹세하노니 황무지에 있는 자는 칼에 엎드러뜨리고 들에 있는 자는 들짐승에게 넘겨 먹히게 하고 산성과 굴에 있는 자는 전염병에 죽게 하리라

sentences.original_text: surely they that are in the wastes shall fall by the sword
and him that is in the open field
will I give to the beasts to be devoured
and they that be in the forts and in the caves
